t: Ord. No. 2025-28S. SUMMARY OF AN ORDINANCE AMENDING AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE TITLE 16 TO REPEAL AND REPLACE THE 2022 CALIFORNIA BUILDING STANDARDS CODE WITH THE 2025 EDITION WITH LOCAL AMENDMENTS; AND REPEAL AND REPLACE THE 2021 INTERNATIONAL PROPERTY MAINTENANCE CODE WITH THE 2024 EDITION AND RELATED MODEL CODES WITH APPENDICES AND AMENDMENTS AS IDENTIFIED THROUGH EXPRESS FINDINGS OF LOCAL NECESSITY
rd: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2025-28S
